pli-tv-bu-vb-pc81:2.1.8: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see {MS.3.1595}. | This means not smaller than 8 by 4 standard ( _sugata_ ) finger-breadths, or 16 by 8 cm; see {Kkh.} and BMC I, pp. 565-566.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc81:2.1.18: _Khajjaka_ . According to {Sp.4.893.16} (commenting on the _sekhiya_ rules) this refers to all non-staple foods: _ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ_ , “Here the non-staple foods which are roots, etc. may all be taken.”
